name: kune-ui-components
description: Collection of UI Components for Kune UI
author: Jean M. Lescure

scripts.setup:dev: yarn && yarn link:utils && yarn link:hocs && yarn build && cp package.json dist/package.json && cd dist && yarn link && cd ../../../ && yarn link kune-ui-components
scripts.link:utils: cd ../kune-ui-utils && yarn setup:dev && cd ../kune-ui-components && yarn link kune-ui-utils
scripts.link:hocs: cd ../kune-ui-hocs && yarn setup:dev && cd ../kune-ui-components && yarn link kune-ui-hocs
